head.supplied: Medical Society of Victoria. ¶ Melbourne, January 26th, 1871 ¶ Sir, ¶ I beg to inform you that the Monthly Meeting of the Medical Society of Victoria will be held in the Hall of the Royal Society, on ...

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center; font-variant: small-caps; font-style: italic;

div.p: Printed notice found inserted in a copy of Victoria Votes and Proceedings of the Legislative Council, Session 1850, Bills. Medical Society of Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end; font-style: italic;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;

p.seg: I beg to inform you that the Monthly Meeting of the Medical Society of Victoria will be held in the Hall of the Royal Society, on Wednesday, February 1st, at Eight o'clock, p.m.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Drs Rees and W. Smith will be balloted for as ordinary members.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Dr Thomas will relate a case of Lithotomy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: The postponed discussion on Dr Singleton's paper will be concluded.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Dr Ralph will make some observations and experiments with the Microscope on the chemical action of Choral, Chloroform, Prussic Acid and other agents on the blood.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-style: italic;
